sql.if: WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%' OR

mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM member WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM no, n.*, (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM member m WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = n.MEMBER_ID) name FROM (SELECT * FROM notice n ORDER BY root, step DESC) n ORDER BY no DESC) n WHERE no BETWEEN #{beginList} and #{endList}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (id, root, title, content, MEMBER_ID, filename, filepath) VALUES (NT_SEQ.nextval, NT_SEQ.currval, #{title }, #{content }, #{MEMBER_ID }, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice set title = #{title} , content = #{content}, filename = #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath = #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
